text: 13.5: Sav 8.2; 1 Pi 2.19Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza ŋgui gari gumgir pani, nza mben piin kɨrga. Nza mba Fhe Bakɨmen ndav shirɨ bakɨme gum vheza mbatɨgira rivgip, mbe nzuai buni mbarararga fhu. Fhuvara. Nza wari wo ndavi vherir, nza khueŋ kaŋgirga, ne tɨvar vhuuŋ ma. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap mba tɨva zɨn vui.
